title: Get Lectured: Kent State University, Spring '25
author: Josh Niland
byline: By Josh Niland Feb 6, '25 6:35 PM EST
excerpt: Kent State University has shared its lecture poster and speaker information to go with our Get Lectured roundup of the different College of Architecture and Environmental Design events occurring during the Spring semester. The list includes appearances from Antonio Sanmartin Gabás (January 22)...
text: Kent State University has shared its lecture poster and speaker information to go with our Get Lectured roundup of the different College of Architecture and Environmental Design events occurring during the Spring semester. The list includes appearances from Antonio Sanmartin Gabás (January 22); Jonsra Rush (February 17); Krzysztof Wodiczko (February 26); Lawrence R. Armstrong (February 27); Belinda Tato (March 3); Léa-Catherine Szacka (March 19); and Winka Dubbeldam (March 26). A panel featuring Neeraj Bhatia, Elisa Iturbe, Lydia Kallipoliti, Paul Mosley, and Albert Pope will be held on April 4, followed by lectures from Róisín Heneghan (April 14) and Laura Nolte (April 21).  Want to share your school's lecture series? Send us your poster and details to connect@archinect.com.
html:
Kent State University has shared its lecture poster and speaker information to go with our Get Lectured roundup of the different College of Architecture and Environmental Design events occurring during the Spring semester.

The list includes appearances from Antonio Sanmartin Gabás (January 22); Jonsra Rush (February 17); Krzysztof Wodiczko (February 26); Lawrence R. Armstrong (February 27); Belinda Tato (March 3); Léa-Catherine Szacka (March 19); and Winka Dubbeldam (March 26). A panel featuring Neeraj Bhatia, Elisa Iturbe, Lydia Kallipoliti, Paul Mosley, and Albert Pope will be held on April 4, followed by lectures from Róisín Heneghan (April 14) and Laura Nolte (April 21). 

Want to share your school's lecture series? Send us your poster and details to connect@archinect.com.
